flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 games total because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=60>>60
They need to win 40 games because 60 x (2/3) = <<60*(2/3)=40>>40
The need to win 28 more games because 40 - 12 = <<40-12=28>>28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
